# Project Logos

Place your project logo images in this folder.

## Logo File Names:
- `netflix-logo.png` or `netflix-logo.jpg` - For Netflix Clone
- `redis-logo.png` or `redis-logo.jpg` - For Redis Cache System
- `bookwagon-logo.png` - For Book Wagon
- `olx-logo.png` - For OLX Clone
- `signin-logo.png` - For Sign-In Form
- `mobile-todo-logo.png` - For Mobile Todo App
- `mobile-weather-logo.png` - For Mobile Weather App
- `mobile-ecommerce-logo.png` - For Mobile E-Commerce App
- `todo-logo.png` - For Todo List App
- `counter-logo.png` - For Counter App
- `alarm-logo.png` - For Alarm Clock App

## Supported Formats:
- PNG (recommended)
- JPG/JPEG
- SVG

## Image Size:
Recommended: 400x200px or larger
Minimum: 200x100px
